faqs_context: Renewable energy includes solar, wind, and hydro power. Solar panels convert sunlight into electricity. Wind turbines harness wind energy. Hydro energy comes from water flow in dams. Renewable energy helps reduce carbon emissions and is sustainable for the environment.
energy_tips: Switch to LED lights to save electricity.
Use solar water heaters to reduce power usage.
Dry clothes in sunlight instead of dryers.
Turn off fans and lights when leaving a room.
Unplug chargers when not in use to avoid phantom loads.
